meanings.definition: Medical treatment that enhances the body's immune system to fight diseases.
meanings.sent1: Immunotherapies can help the body fight off illnesses more effectively.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are exploring the use of immunotherapies to boost the immune system.
meanings.sent3: The immunotherapies were like an army of tiny soldiers fighting against sickness.
meanings.sent4: Her immune system became a fortress with the help of immunotherapies.
meanings.sent5: The power of immunotherapies to strengthen immunity is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The use of substances to stimulate the immune system to attack cancer cells.
meanings.sent1: Immunotherapies target cancer cells to stop their growth.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the effects of immunotherapies on cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The immunotherapies teamed up with the immune system to fight cancer like superheroes.
meanings.sent4: Her body's defense became a warrior with the aid of immunotherapies.
meanings.sent5: The impact of immunotherapies on cancer therapy is groundbreaking.

meanings.definition: A form of therapy that uses the body's own immune system to treat illnesses.
meanings.sent1: Immunotherapies harness the body's defenses to combat diseases.
meanings.sent2: Hospitals are adopting immunotherapies for personalized treatment.
meanings.sent3: The immunotherapies turned the immune system into a healing force.
meanings.sent4: His immune system became a healer with the help of immunotherapies.
meanings.sent5: The potential of immunotherapies in treating illnesses is promising.
